channel.title: Enrit Dev Team - admins needed
channel.description:
Hello,
After awhile, I am choosing to hire a development team. Although I will not pay you, there are benefits other then in-game mod, and credits to the server. We are mostly looking for client developers, but we might need a server developer later on. These people must know how to jar and sign a client, they must be trust worthy, and not leak info. We are also looking for graphics people to help work on client also. When you join our team, we will need you to join our forums, within a week or so, we will be offering advertisements on our website, this of course, will be free to you, up to 2 ads per person may go on it. We will also give 1 link add on our links page of our website (under development) our forums may look a little in-active, only because we just switched over to our own hosted forum, and we had 50 members on our other forum.
Now I will give you the lists of people we need!
[center]Client Developers[/center] [center] [ul][li]Roscoe2k7[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul] [/center]
[center]GFX (helps make graphics for the client, when needed[/center] [center] [ul][li]Blood Shed[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul] [/center]
[center]Server Developer[/center] [center] [ul][li]tacoboyy[/li][/ul] [/center]
*here is some more, "unique positions"*
[center]Story Board and development of Project BLACK[/center] [center] [ul][li]m4g1c4rr0w[/li] [li]Damon[/li] [li][/li][/ul] [/center]
[center]Graphics of Project BLACK[/center] [center] [ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul] [/center]
[center]Coding of Project Black[/center] [center] [ul][li]keating[/li] [li]ghostrider[/li] [li]tramposch[/li] [li]Nate(me)[/li][/ul] [/center]
[u]What is project black?[/u] Please read our topic in news and announcements on our forums, this will explain most of your questions. Basically, we are going to be coding a TXT RPG, and we need administrators of this game, this will have nothing to do with our runescape private server, but you will be administrator on this though.
To sign up use this format plz
[code][b]Name[/b] [b]Experience?[/b] [b]How many years coding?[/b] [b]Do you promise not to leek?[/b] [b]What job do you want?[/b][/code]
http://www.enrit.co.nr
and our advertisement topic is here
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,135905.0.html
